<Abstract>Location and characteristics of 1,124 individual podiform chromite mineral deposits, with grade and tonnage models for chromium as well as several related elements.</Abstract>         <Keywords>           mineral resources; mining and quarrying; mine sites; chromium; rhodium; iridium; ruthenium; palladium; platinum         </Keywords>         <SRS>EPSG:4326</SRS>
